name: 英文寫作技巧：連貫性與銜接性
restrict: ◎限外系修習    ◎第一階段限 榮譽英語學程◎限榮譽英語學程選修◎必須先修過【00UB8A1  英文（二）】
description: Students will improve their ability to express their ideas and opinions clearly and coherently in writing. With a focus on academic writing, students will be given instruction, advice and feedback on the process of writing. The course includes units on the main components of essays, different levels of cohesion, and addresses stylistic concerns such as being concise, understanding the nature of collocations and the use of rhetorical devices. By the end of the course students will have completed for assessment two longer written assignments and as well as a number of shorter piece.
goals:
Students will deepen their understanding of both structural and stylistic issues regarding writing.

Completing this course will significantly enhance their ability to produce cohesive, coherent and engaging texts.
